guidedStep.guidedText: On the Review tab, in the Changes group, click Share Workbook.
In the Share Workbook dialog box, on the Editing tab, check the Allow Changes By More Than One User At The Same Time check box.
In the Track Changes section, in the Keep Change History For text box, double-click and type 15 to display the change history of the last 15 days.
In the Microsoft Office Excel warning box, click OK to save the workbook.
